name: S7 MCP Bridge
description: **S7 MCP Bridge** is a MCP Server that connects AI agents to Siemens industrial PLCs (specifically S7-1500 and S7-1200 models). This allows AI agents to automatically monitor and control industrial equipment by sending commands and receiving data from the machines.

tools.name: Api-GetPermissions
tools.description: Retrieve user permissions from the PLC.

tools.name: Api-GetQuantityStructures
tools.description: Retrieve structure information from the PLC.

tools.name: PlcProgram-Browse
tools.description: Browse tags and metadata in the PLC program.

tools.name: PlcProgram-Read
tools.description: Read single variables from the PLC.

tools.name: PlcProgram-Write
tools.description: Write Boolean, Number, or String tags in the PLC.

plc_ip_addresses.title: PLC IP Addresses
plc_ip_addresses.description: IP addresses of available PLCs separated by comma eg. 192.168.1.10, 192.168.1.20

plc_names.title: PLC Names
plc_names.description: Names of available PLCs separated by comma eg. Machine1, Machine2
